did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: ILR School Experimental Junior Year in New York City Program Report, 1976
did.origination:
New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations (NYSSILR);
Academic Standards and Scholarship Committee
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Report on Experimental Junior Semester in New York City Program to the ILR School Faculty from the Academic Standards and Scholarship Committee, October 25, 1976.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a Report on Experimental Junior Semester in New York City Program to the ILR School Faculty from the Academic Standards and Scholarship Committee, October 25, 1976. The committee consisted of Tove H. Hammer, Robert Hutchens, Philip McCarthy, Donald P. Dietrich (Ex-Officio), and Arthur B. Smith, Jr. (Chairman).

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations.
